title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the answers "yes" and identifies a=3

1 point is earned for the justification

Yes, a=3. The function f is differential on the

interval 3<x<6 and continuous on 3 ≤ x ≤ 6.

Also, f(6)−f(3) 6−3 = 1−0 6−3 = 1 3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@47D0@ .

By the Mean Value Theorem, there is a value c,

3<c<6, such that f ′ ( c ) = 1 3 .
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for the answers "yes" and identifies a=3

1 point is earned for the justification

Yes, a=3. The function f is differentiable on the

interval 3<x<6 and continuous on 3 ≤ x ≤ 6.

Also, f(6)−f(3) 6−3 = 1−0 6−3 = 1 3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@47D0@ .

By the Mean Value Theorem, there is a value c,

3<c<6, such that f ′ ( c ) = 1 3 .
